com.JasonILTG.ScienceMod.gui.machines

Class MachineGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiScreen
        • net.minecraft.client.gui.inventory.GuiContainer
          • com.JasonILTG.ScienceMod.gui.general.InventoryGUI
            • com.JasonILTG.ScienceMod.gui.machines.MachineGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiYesNoCallback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AirExtractorGUI, CentrifugeGUI, ChemReactorGUI, CondenserGUI, DistillerGUI, ElectrolyzerGUI, MixerGUI

    public class MachineGUI
extends InventoryGUI
    Wrapper class for all machine GUIs in ScienceMod.
    Author:
    JasonILTG and syy1125

    • Constructor Detail

      • MachineGUI

        public MachineGUI(MachineGUIContainer container,
                  net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory playerInv,
                  TEMachine te,
                  net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation gui,
                  int guiWidth,
                  int guiHeight,
                  boolean hasProgress,
                  net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation progressFull,
                  net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation progressEmpty,
                  int progressWidth,
                  int progressHeight,
                  int progressX,
                  int progressY,
                  int progressDir,
                  int numTanks,
                  int[] tanksX,
                  int[] tanksY,
                  boolean hasPower,
                  int powerX,
                  int powerY,
                  boolean hasHeat,
                  int tempX,
                  int tempY)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        container - The Container of this GUI
        playerInv - the player's inventory
        te - The tile entity of this GUI
        gui - The GUI's texture
        guiWidth - The GUI's width
        guiHeight - The GUI's height
        hasProgress - Whether the machine has progress
        progressFull - The texture of the full progress bar (null if no progress)
        progressEmpty - The texture of the empty progress bar (null if no progress)
        progressWidth - The width of the progress bar (0 if no progress)
        progressHeight - The height of the progress bar (0 if no progress)
        progressX - The x-position of the progress bar (0 if no progress)
        progressY - The y-position of the progress bar (0 if no progress)
        progressDir - The direction the progress bar progresses (0 if no progress)
        numTanks - The number of tanks the machine has
        tanksX - The x-positions of the tanks (null if no tanks)
        tanksY - The y-positions of the tanks (null if no tanks)
        hasPower - Whether the machine has power
        powerX - The x-position of the power display (0 if no power)
        powerY - The y-position of the power display (0 if no power)
        hasHeat - Whether the machine has heat
        tempX - The x-position of the temperature display (0 if no heat)
        tempY - The y-position of the temperature display (0 if no heat)
